Class SVMLinearClassificationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.svm.SVMLinearClassificationModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class SVMLinearClassificationModel
extends Object
implements IgniteModel<Vector,Double>, Exportable<SVMLinearClassificationModel>, JSONWritable
